About Me

BIO

Detail-oriented and highly motivated B.Tech (CSE) graduate (2025) with hands-on expertise in Python, Data Analytics, MySQL, and foundational AI/ML concepts. Certified in Python, Django, and Data Science with practical exposure through internships. Full Stack Developer/h3>

I am a Full Stack Web Developer with experience in building complete web applications from concept to deployment. I work on both the front-end and back-end, ensuring that websites are fast, secure, scalable, and user-friendly. I enjoy solving complex problems, designing efficient systems, and turning ideas into fully functional digital products.

Front End Developer

As a Front-End Developer, I focus on creating clean, responsive, and interactive user interfaces. I pay close attention to design, performance, and usability to ensure a smooth user experience across all devices. My goal is to build visually appealing websites that are easy to use and aligned with modern web standards.

Graphic Designer

I am also a Graphic Designer with a strong eye for visual detail and creativity. I design graphics that communicate ideas clearly and effectively, including logos, banners, social media content, and website visuals. I combine creativity with design principles to create visuals that enhance brand identity and user engagement.
